summary: 1982  was a common year starting on Friday of the Gregorian calendar.
full_text: 1982  was a common year starting on Friday  of the Gregorian calendar, the 1982nd year of the Common Era  and Anno Domini  designations, the 982nd year of the 2nd millennium, the 82nd year of the 20th century, and the 3rd year of the 1980s decade.
